name: Lead
short_description: Lead (as the metal) is a heavily WIP open-source first person shooter planned to feature both extensive single-player campaigns and online multiplayer action. As a total conversion of Cube 2: Sauerbraten, it will combine nice graphics with fast and entertaining gameplay. Currently, there's almost no content, so if you can, please help out!
summary: Tactically-oriented first person shooter, heavily WIP
